title: FT only: Many T-cards for trade (T206's with tough backs, T215, T213, T216)
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: FT only: Many T-cards for trade (T206's with tough backs, T215, T213, T216)
posts.post_content:
I'm only looking to trade.

Email me at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url] if you have something on my want list below and you want to trade or sell.

Link to my FOR TRADE cards:
[url]http://s84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/Cards%20for%20Trade/[/url]
